title: PM commends Federal Interior Minister, Chief Ministers on Ashur security arrangements
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 17 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Wednesday appreciated the Federal Minister for Interior and the Provincial Chief Ministers for making foolproof security arrangements leading to peaceful observance of Youm-e-Ashur in the country.
The prime minister said that under the leadership of federal minister for interior and four chief ministers, the Youm-e-Ashur related activities ended peacefully.
“With the blessings of Allah Almighty, all the processions and Majalis in the country were culminated with religious respect and devotion,” PM Office Media Wing, in a press release, quoted the prime minister as saying.
The prime minister also commended the harmony and cohesion among the federal and provincial governments in activating the security and law enforcement agencies on the occasion.
